prompt.content: Using Stride, Inc, (ticker: LRN) 10-K for fiscal year ended June 30, 2025 calculate the year over year % change of enrollment per school (defined as enrollment for the year divided by number of schools where school-as-service offering was provided during corresponding school year) for Career Learning segment from FY2024 to FY2025. Show answer in % rounded to 2 decimals.

messages.content: [{"criteria":"FY2025 Career Learning enrollment (data located in FY2025 10-K Enrollment Data table (MD&A section))= 96.3 thousand.","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"FY2024 Career Learning enrollment (data located in FY2025 10-K Enrollment Data table (MD&A section))= 72.7 thousand."},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Number of schools where School-as-a-Service offering was provided in the 2024–2025 school year (data located in ITEM 1. BUSINESS section of FY2025 10-k) for Career learning segment= 56."},{"criteria":"Number of schools where School-as-a-Service offering was provided in the 2023–2024 school year (data located in ITEM 1. BUSINESS section of FY2024 10-k) for Career learning segment= 56.","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Enrollment per school for FY2025 = 96,300 ÷ 56 = 1,719.64 students per school."},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Computed enrollment per school for FY2024 = 72,700 ÷ 56 = 1,298.21 students per school."},{"criteria":"Year-over-year percentage change in enrollment per school from FY2024 to FY2025 = [(1,719.64 − 1,298.21) ÷ 1,298.21] × 100 = 32.46%","operator":"correctness"}]
